prompt.analysis:
Analyze this video comprehensively. Provide:

## Summary
A detailed summary of the video content.

## Key Moments
List key moments with timestamps in [MM:SS] format. For each moment, describe what happens.

## Insights
Notable observations, themes, patterns, or interesting details.

## Talking Points
Key discussion points or takeaways someone should know after watching this video.

## Technical Notes
Any relevant technical observations (video quality, editing style, production notes).
